quotes.quote: Art quotes are either revolution plagiarism.
quotes.author: paul gauguin

quotes.quote: Art is either revolution or plagiarism.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: art quotes great artist simplifier.
quotes.author: vincent van gogh

quotes.quote: The great artist is the simplifier.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: art quotes painting self discovery every good artist paints what.
quotes.author: jackson pollock

quotes.quote: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: art quotes had much fire many plans.
quotes.author: claude money

quotes.quote: I had so much fire in me and so many plans.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: art quotes artist cannot fail success.
quotes.author: charles horton cooley

quotes.quote: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one.
quotes.author: Charles Cooley

quotes.quote: art quotes draw you must close your eyes sing.
quotes.author: pablo picasso

quotes.quote: To draw you must close your eyes and sing.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: art quotes meant disturb science reassures.
quotes.author: georges braque

quotes.quote: Art is meant to disturb, science reassures.
quotes.author: Georges Braque

quotes.quote: The world always seems brighter when you’ve just made something that wasn’t there before.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: art quotes must life must belong everybody.
quotes.author: marina abramovic

quotes.quote: Art must be life — it must belong to everybody.
quotes.author: Marina Abramović

quotes.quote: art quotes enables find ourselves lose same time.
quotes.author: thomas merton

quotes.quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is ‘good’ sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Let’s get a little crazy here.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: Every act of creation is first an act of destruction.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: We must never forget that art is not a form of propaganda; it is a form of truth.
quotes.author: Kennedy

quotes.quote: Life is creation – self and circumstances, the raw material.
quotes.author: Dorothy Richardson

quotes.quote: Art is the only serious thing in the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You can look at a picture for a week and never think of it again.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: If I paint something, I don’t want to have to explain what it is.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Tell your own story, and you will be interesting.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: It is better to be high-spirited even though one makes more mistakes, than to be narrow-minded and all to prudent.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: The power of nature is such that it’s what all art strives to be.
quotes.author: Rick Rubin

quotes.quote: Bring your humanity to your art.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

quotes.quote: The greater the artist, the greater the doubt.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: All art is a kind of confession, more or less oblique.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Our primary function is to create an emotion and our secondary function is to sustain that emotions.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Art is standing with one hand extended into the universe and one hand extended into the world, and letting ourselves be a conduit for passing energy.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You have to systematically create confusion, it sets creativity free.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: I have already settled it for myself so flattery and criticism go down the same drain and I am quite free.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Never worry about being obsessive.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: I think being different, going against the grain of society is the greatest thing in the world.
quotes.author: Elijah Wood

quotes.quote: In the mind of every artist there is a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: To be an artist, you need to exist in a world of silence.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The best reason to paint is that there is no reason to paint.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: The counterfeit innovator is wildly self-confident.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: If you ask me what I came to do in this world, I, an artist, will answer you: I am here to live out loud.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: Art is not a mirror to hold up to society, but a hammer with which to shape it.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: The principles of true art is not to portray, but to evoke.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: In the creative state a man is taken out of himself.
quotes.author: Forster

quotes.quote: I wanted to start a revolution, using art to build the sort of society I myself envisioned.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.quote: A work is finished when an artist realizes his intentions.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Art wasn’t supposed to look nice; it was supposed to make you feel something.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: An artist’s only concern is to shoot for some kind of perfection, and on his own terms, not anyone else’s.
quotes.author: Salinger

quotes.quote: The works must be conceived with fire in the soul but executed with clinical coolness.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: Creativity gives hope that there can be a worthwhile idea.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Only when he no longer knows what he is doing does the painter do good things.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: A woman’s perfume tells more about her than her handwriting.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Art speaks where words are unable to explain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells.
quotes.author: Seuss

quotes.quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: Bad artists copy.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The only art I’ll ever study is stuff that I can steal from.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: I am my own experiment.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you saying, ”You are not a painter,” then by all means paint… and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Art is my life and my life is art.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The moment you think you understand a great work of art, it’s dead for you.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A picture is a poem without words.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Without tradition art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd.Without innovation it is a corpse.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I guess I’m a little weird.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: You don’t take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection – you’ll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: I am not strange.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Those who do not want to imitate anything, produce nothing.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn’t seem so wonderful at all.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Human salvation lies in the hands of the creatively maladjusted.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr

quotes.quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Beauty will save the world.
quotes.author: Dosteovsky

quotes.quote: Painter, paint! Salvador Dalí
Art must destroy violence, only it can do it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Art should tell what the system does not.
quotes.author: @AmuseChimp

quotes.quote: Art is the expression of the profoundest thoughts in the simplest way.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Art is to look at not to criticize.
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.quote: Art is a way of recognizing oneself.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: Personality is everything in art and poetry.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You study, you learn, but you guard the original naivete.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Art lives from constraints and dies from freedom.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Painting is silent poetry.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Sometimes with art, it is important just to look.
quotes.author: Marina Abramović

quotes.quote: Controversy is part of the nature of art and creativity.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Don’t think about making art… Andy Warhol
Every good painter paints what he is.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: A true masterpiece does not tell everything.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Intensity is all that matters in painting.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: To be an artist is to believe in life.
quotes.author: Henry Moore

quotes.quote: Art is a lie that makes us realize truth.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Art is the elimination of the unnecessary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Art is a line around your thoughts.
quotes.author: Gustav Klimt

quotes.quote: Art is coming face to face with yourself.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: I shut my eyes in order to see.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Art = a mad search for individualism.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: The painter has the Universe in his mind and hands.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Perspective is to painting what the bridle is to the horse, the rudder to a ship.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The artist sees what others only catch a glimpse of.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Think eight hours, work two hours.
quotes.author: Mirko Ilic

quotes.quote: Choose only one master – Nature.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Art is not a thing, it is a way.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To create one’s own world takes courage.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: I am not an adventurer by choice but by fate.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: I shall be so brief that I have already finished.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: It is absurd to look for perfection.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: I must have flowers, always, and always.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Life is too short to remain unnoticed.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Knowing how to look is a way of inventing.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: I’m in fine fettle and fired with a desire to paint.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To create, one must first question everything.
quotes.author: Eileen Gray

quotes.quote: Everything starts from a dot.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: To gain freedom is to gain simplicity.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: The more I work, the more I want to work.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: I work like a gardener.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: At the heart of all great art is an essential melancholy.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: The only thing I know is that I paint because I need to.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Don’t pay any attention to what they write about you.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: It is not a torment to be an artist.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: Don’t be fooled by success and money.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: When you do things for their own sake, that’s when you create your best work.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: To be great, art has to point somewhere.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: When I think of art I think of beauty.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: The most important thing about art is to work.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: Remember one rule of thumb: the more scared we are of a work or calling, the more sure we can be that we have to do it.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: I started painting as a hobby when I was little.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: A true artist is not one who is inspired but one who inspires others.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Make art that makes you happy.
quotes.author: Sahil Lavingia

quotes.quote: If I’m going to be anything more than average, if anyone is going to remember me, then I need to go further, in art, in life, in everything! Salvador Dalí
The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The aim of every artist is to arrest motion, which is life, by artificial means and hold it fixed so that a hundred years later, when a stranger looks at it, it moves again since it is life.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Art is the queen of all sciences communicating knowledge to all the generations of the world.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: With the pride of the artist, you must blow against the walls of every power that exists the small trumpet of your defiance.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: The artist must create a spark before he can make a fire and before art is born, the artist must be ready to be consumed by the fire of his own creation.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: If art is to nourish the roots of our culture, society must set the artist free to follow his vision wherever it takes him.
quotes.author: Kennedy

quotes.quote: My role in society, or any artist’s or poet’s role, is to try and express what we all feel.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: He who works with his hands and his head and his heart is an artist.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what people say of you, why not spend time trying to accomplish something they will admire.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: It’s on the strength of observation and reflection that one finds a way.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Stay firmly in your path and dare; be wild two hours a day.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: I have been enlightened.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Visions are worth fighting for.
quotes.author: Why spend your life making someone else’s dreams? Tim Burton

quotes.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I accomplish.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Not everyone can become a great artist, but a great artist can come from anywhere.
quotes.author: Peter O’Toole

quotes.quote: The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: By working hard, old man, I hope to make something good one day.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: One must spoil as many canvases as one succeeds with.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: If I close my eyes, I see things better than with my eyes open.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: We don’t make mistakes.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: I am not an inventor.
quotes.author: Anne Bogart

quotes.quote: We have always been shamelss about stealing great ideas.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: There’s a fine line between genius and insanity.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: It’s better to create something that others criticize than to create nothing and criticize others.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: I just wanna make the world a better-looking place.
quotes.author: If you don’t like it, you can paint over it! Banksy (Check out Banksy on Instagram)

quotes.quote: People say graffiti is ugly, irresponsible and childish… but that’s only if it’s done properly.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: We tell people sometimes: we’re like drug dealers, come into town and get everybody absolutely addicted to painting.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: There are three responses to a piece of design: yes, no and wow.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: If people would just look at the paintings, I don’t think they would have any trouble enjoying them.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: As my artist’s statement explains, my work is utterly incomprehensible and is therefore full of deep significance.
quotes.author: Calvin

quotes.quote: The fact I myself do not understand what my paintings mean while I am painting them does not imply that they are meaningless.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: The secret of my influence has always been that it remained secret.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: If you understand a painting beforehand, you might as well not paint it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: I believe in general death but in the death of Dalí absolutely not.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: What is originality? Undetected plagiarism.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Artists are just children who refuse to put down their crayons.
quotes.author: Al Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: I’m not performing miracles, I’m using up and wasting a lot of paint.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: The critic has to educate the public; the artist has to educate the critic.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Bus stops are far more interesting and useful places to have art than in museums.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: The job of the artist is always to deepen the mystery.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: My paintings are not about what is seen.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: All great art contains at its center contemplation, a dynamic contemplation.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: If art doesn’t make us better, then what on earth is it for.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Treat a work of art like a prince.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The achilles heel of an artist Lies in the hope that his art is good.
quotes.author: Kapil Gupta

quotes.quote: A work of art has no importance whatever to society.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Forget yourself.
quotes.author: Yayoi Kusama

quotes.quote: The creative union of the conscious with the unconscious is what one usually calls ‘inspiration’.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: What is important is to spread confusion, not eliminate it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: People love mystery, and that is why they love my paintings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: An artist is someone who produces things that people don’t need to have but that he – for some reason – thinks it would be a good idea to give them.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Not everyone is capable of madness; and of those lucky enough to be capable, not many have the courage for it.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: Perhaps it’s true that I’m very hard on myself, but that’s better than exhibiting mediocre work… too few were satisfactory enough to trouble the public with.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: It is a tragedy that we live in a world where physical courage is so common, and moral courage is so rare.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: It is better to have done something than to have been someone.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: I often painted fragments of things because it seemed to make my statement as well as or better than the whole could.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: The true painter must be able, with the most usual things, to have the most unusual ideas.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The creative process is a process of surrender, not control.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: I would like to paint the way a bird sings.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: One person’s craziness is another person’s reality.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: Art is a step in the known toward the unknown.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Art helps us identify with one another and expands our notion of we – from the local to the global.
quotes.author: Olafur Eliasson

quotes.quote: See also: Why art has the power to change the world
Every line is the actual experience with its own unique story.
quotes.author: Cy Twombly

quotes.quote: The main thing in making art often is letting go of your expectation and your idea.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: There is no abstract art.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Most people die before they are fully born.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: So much time is wasted on trying to be better than others.
quotes.author: Elijah Wood

quotes.quote: An artist is a dreamer consenting to dream of the actual world.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The artist must train not only his eye but also his soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: There is no must in art because art is free.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: The Revolution introduced me to art, and in turn, art introduced me to the Revolution! Albert Einstein
The painting rises from the brushstrokes as a poem rises from the words.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: The public wants to understand and learn in a single day, a single minute, what the artist has spent years learning.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: I don’t paint things.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: There is nothing more difficult for a truly creative painter than to paint a rose, because before he can do so he has first to forget all the roses that were ever painted.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: It is better to paint from memory, for thus your work will be your own.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Painting is easy when you don’t know how, but very difficult when you do.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: If I could say it in words there would be no reason to paint.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Art is not about thinking something up.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not of the sitter.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The artist is not a different kind of person, but every person is a different kind of artist.
quotes.author: Eric Gill

quotes.quote: He only moves toward the perfection of his art whose criticism surpasses his achievement.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Contrary to general belief, an artist is never ahead of his time but most people are far behind theirs.
quotes.author: Edgard Varese

quotes.quote: Practice what you know, and it will help to make clear what now you do not know.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: An artist is not paid for his labor but for his vision.
quotes.author: James Whistler

quotes.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: All art, like all love, is rooted in heartache.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Hatred is a parasite that devours all.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: These landscapes of water and reflection have become an obsession.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: We should always remember that sensitiveness and emotion constitute the real content of a work of art.
quotes.author: Maurice Ravel

quotes.quote: Art and love are the same thing: It’s the process of seeing yourself in things that are not you.
quotes.author: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.quote: Works of art are of an infinite loneliness and with nothing so little to be reached as with criticism.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The artist is a receptacle for emotions that come from all over the place: from the sky, from the earth, from a scrap of paper, from a passing shape, from a spider’s web.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: To labor in the arts for any reason other than love is prostitution.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter how the paint is put on, as long as something is said.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: (On how he knows when he’s finished) How do you know when you’re finished making love? Jackson Pollock
When I am in my painting, I’m not aware of what I’m doing.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: I couldn’t give you something mediocre even if that’s all you asked for.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: When you start a painting, it is somewhat outside you.
quotes.author: Fernando Botero

quotes.quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Everyone discusses my art and pretends to understand, as if it were necessary to understand, when it is simply necessary to love.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Nothing can be accomplished without love.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: A work of art which did not begin in emotion is not art.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Art must be an expression of love or it is nothing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: I am not sick.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Artwork is a representation of our devotion to life.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: Life is sometimes hard.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Without anxiety and illness I should have been like a ship without a rudder.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Something is always born of excess: great art was born of great terrors, great loneliness, great inhibitions, instabilities, and it always balances them.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: No longer shall I paint interiors with men reading and women knitting.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: I build a kind of wall between myself and t he model so that I can paint in peace behind it.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Disease, insanity, and death were the angels that attended my cradle, and since then have followed me throughout my life.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Someone else’s vision will never be as good as your own vision of your self.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: I’ve been absolutely terrified every moment of my life – and I’ve never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Without the sense of fellowship with men of like mind, of preoccupation with the objective, the eternally unattainable in the field of art and scientific research, life would have seemed to me empty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The more ignoble I find life, the more strongly I react by contradiction, in humour and in an outburst of liberty and expansion.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: There may be a great fire in our soul, yet no one ever comes to warm himself at it, and the passers-by see only a wisp of smoke.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Whatever you do in life, if you want to be creative and intelligent, and develop your brain, you must do everything with the awareness that everything, in some way, connects to everything else.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Life is more important than art; that’s what makes art important.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Everything alters me, but nothing changes me.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Mistakes are almost always of a sacred nature, understand them thoroughly.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: In a sense, as we are creative beings, our lives become our work of art.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: All true artists, whether they know it or not, create from a place of no-mind, from inner stillness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: I value those artists who embody the expression of their life.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: I paint objects as I think them not as I see them.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: To look at something as though we had never seen it before requires great courage.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Creativity is a lot like happiness.
quotes.author: Bert Dodson

quotes.quote: Look around.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: In my experience, the best creative work is never done when one is unhappy.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Art is not a pleasure, a solace, or an amusement; art is a great matter.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Art is a human activity having for its purpose the transmission to others of the highest and best feelings to which men have risen.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Art is unquestionably one of the purest and highest elements in human happiness.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: There are some days when I think I’m going to die from an overdose of satisfaction.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: Beauty should be edible, or not at all.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: All I did was to look at what the universe showed me, to let my brush bear witness to it.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Every day I discover more and more beautiful things.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: I haven’t many years left ahead of me and I must devote all my time to painting, in the hope of achieving something worthwhile in the end, something if possible that will satisfy me.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: I think it’s so foolish for people to want to be happy.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: A simple line painted with the brush can lead to freedom and happiness.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: We must do our work for its own sake, not for fortune or attention or applause.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched – they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Every morning when I wake up, I experience an exquisite joy – the joy of being Salvador Dalí – and I ask myself in rapture: What wonderful things is this Salvador Dalí going to accomplish today?” Salvador Dalí
After a certain high level of technical skill is achieved, science and art tend to coalesce in aesthetics, plasticity, and form.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Personally, I experience the greatest degree of pleasure in having contact with works of art.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Great art is indefinable but that’s all right; it exists anyway.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Great art transcends its culture and touches on that which is eternal.
quotes.author: Madeleine L’Engle

quotes.quote: Photography my passion, the search for truth, my obsession.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who see beautiful things in humble places where other people see nothing.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Filling a space in a beautiful way – that is what art means to me.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Artists to my mind are the real architects of change.
quotes.author: Burroughs

quotes.quote: The purpose of art is mystery.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Man needs music, literature, and painting – all those oases of perfection that make up art – to compensate for the rudeness and materialism of life.
quotes.author: Fernando Botero

quotes.quote: Art is restoration: the idea is to repair the damages that are inflicted in life, to make something that is fragmented – which is what fear and anxiety do to a person – into something whole.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The arts are not a way to make a living. They are a very human way of making life more bearable.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: The function of the artist in a disturbed society is to give awareness of the universe, to ask the right questions, and to elevate the mind.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: The activity of art is… as important as the activity of language itself, and as universal.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: My art is capable of liberating man from the tyranny of the ‘practical, rational world.’ Salvador Dalí
In art, and in the higher ranges of science, there is a feeling of harmony which underlies all endeavor.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One of the strongest motives that lead men to art and science is escape from everyday life with its painful crudity and hopeless dreariness, from the fetters of one’s own ever-shifting desires.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: For as long as I can remember I have suffered from a deep feeling of anxiety which I have tried to express in my art.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Art is an escape from reality.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Art should be something that liberates your soul, provokes the imagination and encourages people to go further.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, the only secret is to believe in it and satisfy yourself.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: For me, painting is a way to forget life.
quotes.author: Georges Rouault

quotes.quote: What art offers is space – a certain breathing room for the spirit.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: The artist has one function–to affirm and glorify life.
quotes.author: Edward Brown

quotes.quote: I want to touch people with my art.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The goal of art was the vital expression of self.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: A good painter has two main objects to paint, man and the intention of his soul.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: All the sorrow, all the bitterness, all the sadness, I forget them and ignore them in the joy of working.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: The attitude that nature is chaotic and that the artist puts order into it is a very absurd point of view, I think.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: I am an artist because the knot is so powerful I just can not, nor want to be, anything else or do anything else.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: See also: 7 Ways Art Improves Quality of Life
Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: An artist discovers his genius the day he dares not to please.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Creativity is the residue of time wasted.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most seductive thing about art is the personality of the artist himself.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: You are born alone.
quotes.author: Louise Bourgeois

quotes.quote: See also: Artist Louise Bourgeois on How Solitude Enriches Creative Work
Painting must be fertile.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn’t thinking.
quotes.author: Patton

quotes.quote: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn’t.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Every new idea is just a mashup or a remix of one or more previous ideas.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: They say everything looks better with odd numbers of things.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: Creativity often consists of merely turning up what is already there.
quotes.author: Bernice Fitz-Gibbon

quotes.quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Candor could not be more crucial to our creative process.
quotes.author: Ed Catmull (Pixar)

quotes.quote: The most creative people are willing to work in the shadow of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Ed Catmull (Pixar)

quotes.quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Self-doubt can be an ally.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: Are you paralyzed with fear? That’s a good sign.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope for it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I’d like to pretend that I’ve never seen anything, never read anything, never heard anything, and then make something.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: I want to express my feelings rather than illustrate them.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Do not imitate one another’s style.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Whether you succeed or not is irrelevant, there is no such thing.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Creativity is more than just being different.
quotes.author: Charles Mingus

quotes.quote: Don’t think.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: You cannot be all things to all people.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The modern artist… is working and expressing an inner world – in other words – expressing the energy, the motion, and other inner forces.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Sometimes people say I should see a therapist, but I don’t want any therapist wrecking my weirdness.
quotes.author: Peter Wolf

quotes.quote: My great mistake, the fault for which I can’t forgive myself, is that one day I ceased my obstinate pursuit of my own individuality.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The one who walks alone, is likely to find himself in places no one has ever been.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To this day, no one has come up with a set of rules for originality.
quotes.author: Les Paul

quotes.quote: My work is always better when I am alone and follow my own impressions.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: I want to be important.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: I am still learning.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: You can’t learn techniques and then try to become a painter.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: I’m not telling you it’s going to be easy – I’m telling you it’s going to be worth it.
quotes.author: Art Williams

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can think about when you’re working is yourself.
quotes.author: Agnes Martin

quotes.quote: You can’t be content with mastery; you have to push yourself to become a student again.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: If you ever find that you’re the most talented person in the room, you need to find another room.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: Start copying what you love.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: If you steal from one author, it’s plagiarism; if you steal from many, it’s research.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: I was never capable of being an average pupil.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few as there are any other great artists.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: More important than a work of art itself is what it will sow.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: If only I’d known my differentness would be an asset, then my earlier life would have been much easier.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: The progress of an artist is a continual self-sacrifice, a continual extinction of personality.
quotes.author: Eliot

quotes.quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One must, of course, have one’s entire experience behind one and not have lost the freshness of instinct.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: All artists are willing to suffer for their work.
quotes.author: But why are so few prepared to learn to draw? Banksy

quotes.quote: I decided to start anew – to strip away what I had been taught, to accept as true my own thinking.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is a widely accepted notion among painters that it does not matter what one paints as long as it is well painted.
quotes.author: Mark Rothko

quotes.quote: The most valuable thing a teacher can impart to children is not knowledge and understanding per se but a longing for knowledge and understanding, and an appreciation for intellectual values, whether they be artistic, scientific, or moral.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A society'''s competitive advantage will come not from how well its schools teach the multiplication and periodic tables, but from how well they stimulate imagination and creativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The great moral teachers of humanity were in a way artistic geniuses in the art of living.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The value of an education in a liberal arts college is not learning of many facts but the training of the mind to think something that cannot be learned from textbooks.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The seed of your next artwork lies embedded in the imperfections of your current piece.
quotes.author: David Bayles

quotes.quote: Our job in this life is not to shape ourselves into some ideal we imagine we ought to be, but to find out who we already are and become it.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield (The War Of Art)

quotes.quote: Don’t worry about how you ‘should’ draw it.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: I am always doing that which I can not do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Everybody draws when they are little.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Old age is a hindrance to creativity but cannot crush my youthful spirit.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The great geniuses are those who have kept their childlike spirit and have added to it breadth of vision and experience.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Anybody with artistic ambitions is always trying to reconnect with the way they saw things as a child.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: There is nothing that makes me happier than making a child smile.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: The main thing is to be moved, to love, to hope, to tremble, to live.
quotes.author: Be a man before being an artist! Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: Not everyone will understand your journey.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: In order to produce something new, you have to return to the original source, to the childhood of mankind.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: A young man who is unable to commit a folly is already an old man.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: You need the dark in order to show the light.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: Some colors reconcile themselves to one another, others just clash.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Color is a power which directly influences the soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Color is a means to exert a direct influence on the soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Color is the keyboard.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: There is no blue without yellow and without orange.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh (Did he mean that there’s no sadness without happiness?)

quotes.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: It is only after years of preparation that the young artist should touch color – not color used descriptively, that is, but as a means of personal expression.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: I’ve been forty years discovering that the queen of all colors is black.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: It is with color that you render light, though you must also feel this light, have it within yourself.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn’t say any other way – things I had no words for.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: The point is to know how to use the colors, the choice of which is, when all’s said and done, a matter of habit.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Critic asks: ‘And what, sir, is the subject matter of that painting?’ – ‘The subject matter, my dear good fellow, is the light.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: What I need most of all is color, always, always.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Without atmosphere a painting is nothing.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Finish the work, otherwise an unfinished work will finish you.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Another year is ending, but something is pending.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: I’m never finished with my paintings; the further I get, the more I seek the impossible and the more powerless I feel.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: Above all, an artist must never be too easily satisfied with what he has done.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: No great work of art is ever finished.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: There are dozens of unfinished or aborted projects in my files, but I can only assume they don’t get done because they’re not robust enough to struggle through the birth process.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: I know the sag of the unfinished poem.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: You are an unfinished work in progress.
quotes.author: Karen Salmonsohn

quotes.quote: I never want projects to be finished; I have always believed in unfinished work.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: I always believed that my work should be unfinished in the sense that I encourage people to add their creativity to it, either conceptually or physically.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: When I’m playing, I’m never through.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: I know I will leave my work unfinished.
quotes.author: David Robinson

quotes.quote: Can anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: A man should hear a little music, read a little poetry, and see a fine picture every day of his life, in order that worldly cares may not obliterate the sense of the beautiful which God has implanted in the human soul.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Only God creates.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Painting is the grandchild of nature.
quotes.author: Rembrandt

quotes.quote: Practicing an art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow, for heaven’s sake.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut
